DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of this study is to assess the total CV risk in patients with type 2 diabetes and also to assess the impact of rosiglitazone in the total CV risk and the parameters of metabolic syndrome.
DOC.brief_title: Cardiovascular (CV) Risk Evaluation In Type 2 Diabetes Subjects
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Patients with diabetes type 2 that their physician has decided to prescribe AVANDIA for better control of their condition Have signed informed consent Patients with ALT > 2.5x the normal value With heart failure symptoms With diagnosis of angina pectoris or stable angina demanding continuous treatment with nitrates With recent myocardial infarction (<6 months) With severe renal disfunction Pregnant or lactating or planned to be pregnant during the study Under investigational drug treatment Alcoholic or drug abuser
